snippet: Denny Hamlin took the lead on a restart and had to sweat out his fuel mileage over the final few laps to win at Phoenix International Raceway in Avondale, Ariz.
abstract: Nascar's Denny Hamlin wins his second Sprint Cup race at Phoenix International Raceway in Avondale, Ariz.
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin took the lead on a restart and had to sweat out his fuel mileage over the final few laps to win at Phoenix International Raceway in Avondale, Ariz.
